channel.title: Homes on Allen Zehan Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Allen Zehan Zhao

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

I am currently a first year Information Systems masters student at School of Economics and Management, Tsinghua University. I’m carrying out various research projects under the supervision of Professor Sean Xin Xu and Professor Xixi Li. My research interests lie in Information Systems, Social Networks, Health Information Technologies, Web Technologies & Programming and Applied Machine Learning.

I graduated from University of International Business and Economics with a Bachelors degree of Management in 2015. I was a PHP Development Intern at Tencent Technologies Beijing from Jan. 2014 to Jun. 2014. I was a Full-stack Rails Development Intern at Alpha Team, China Renaissance from Jan. 2015 to Jun. 2015.

In summers of 2014 and 2016, I participated in Google Summer of Code with Joomla and Bundler.

In my spare time, I like to swim and play Ultimate frisbee. And I’m a huge fan of various TV shows.

Other details of me could be found at my LinkedIn page.

item.title: teaching
item.description:
I am a teaching assistant for the following courses at Tsinghua University:

  • 80511312: Electronic Commerce (MBA Elective Course, Instructed by Prof. Xixi Li)
